entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False warning of property hiding inherited method member #63509
  • `inheritdoc` inside a `param` tag will apply all the `param` tags' text instead of the respective for the parameter #63508

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger keyword completions in compiler directives when typing #63510
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #63503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
